EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202207-HHS-ENT-PSocA-HMA-Webinar-with-MSFT.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Unlocking the potential of care coordination
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Unlocking the Potential of Care Coordination
June 30 | 2 p.m. Eastern
Image Female Doctor using computer
In this fireside chat, we’ll explore how organizations can implement an innovative business model and virtual care strategy that is consumer- and provider-centric and spans the care continuum to improve satisfaction and outcomes.
Register now <[[https://hmacademy.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZIqce6trz4oGtSAFnqXdkRGyP3hmgDY5nVs]]>
Join our fireside chat to:
Understand the value of an omnichannel virtual care strategy to improve care coordination and collaboration Explore the technical infrastructure required to empower care team collaboration, enable real-time interventions, and deliver a connected, data-driven and seamless virtual health experience Learn about Northwell Health’s innovative approach to care delivery across the care continuum
Speakers
Bruce Brandes SVP, Health System Innovation Teladoc Health
Shayan Vyas, MD Senior Vice President & Medical Director Teladoc Health
Kim Swafford MHA Healthcare Industry Executive, Americas Microsoft
Martin Doerfler, MD SVP, Clinical Strategy and Development Associate Chief Medical Officer Northwell Health
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
